website_summaries.verdict: Formula is aimed at the whole body development of kittens, while helping them maintain a healthy weight.
pros: A few customers report using this food to successfully help with weight control for kittens
Adult version and flavors available as kitten ages
cons: Kittens may pick around some flavors of kibbles
Kittens with sensitive stomachs struggle with this food, owners say

customer_reviews.title: Neither of my cats liked this food.
customer_reviews.text: Wellness is a great product but my cats wont eat it. I bought the kitten food formula per my vets recommendation that I take my old skinny kitty off of grainless high protein diet because it's easier on her kidneys and she needs to eat more carbs to hopefully put on weight but she won't eat this food. Switched to another lessor known brand in a duck and sweet pea flour formula, she doesn't like that a whole lot better but at least she eats a little. I gave my second bag of this to my neighbors unopened for their cats.
customer_reviews.author: Ura Beatch

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Have Their Day but Cats Have 365
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying this food for our Bengal Cat since he was born. We will keep him on it until about 18 months and then switch to another Wellness Brand product. He loves it. We had no problem switching him from the cat chow food from where we purchased him from to this kitten food. We fill up the petmate feeder container and he self regulated. One 5.9lb bag will last us a whole month. I also find that his poop is not as smelly as other cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I recently adopted a kitten and spent hours trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently adopted a kitten and spent hours trying to figure out which kitten food I should buy. I wanted to avoid chicken meal as well as gluten, and this passed the test! She looks so much healthier now. The only downside is her rather pungent stool, but I'm hoping that goes away soon!
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: High quality but STINKY butts!
customer_reviews.text: After a LOT of research I chose this food for our 2 new kittens (shelter, of course), and while I love the ingredients and they seem to love the food, I can't handle the stinky butt factor. I chose Wellness over Blue because I read some Blue reviews about the stank-butt-syndrome, but apparently it's a frequent occurrence in many brands. I'm giving the slightly higher end Wellness a try (Core), so fingers crossed. If that doesn't work I'll try Blue- or get some nose plugs for the next 6-months!
customer_reviews.author: J. Salzenstein

customer_reviews.title: They do enjoy eating this food
customer_reviews.text: After switching two kittens to this food instead of meow mix kitten nibbles, almost all of their stomach issues have subsided! They do enjoy eating this food. It is just a few dollars cheaper on here than i have found in the stores. Would recommend this to anyone with young kittens. Four stars because the cost is pretty high but the ingredients are very healthy for them.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Qualitity but all dry food not safe for Male Cats
customer_reviews.text: Kittens love but all dry foods are not recommended for male cats especially, due to dangers of dry food to urinary tract. Now use only wet Nature Variety' Instinct wet food 5.5 aluminum cans, chicken or turkey. No dangerous perservitives, no dangerous can liner chemicals, only top off the line chicken or turkey - no cheap by products. Not usuing fish as causes serious health issues. Switched over slowly to Instinct and kittens love.
customer_reviews.author: A G

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty too
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this foot and I feel good feeding it to her. Her fur seemed to change within the first week after I switched to this brand. Her coat became thinker, shiny and glossy. She digs into this food like it is delicious. I haven't tasted it but her behavior says it all. I tried to switch to a big box store brand that is also highly rated. Kitty won't touch it. This is definitely her favorite food and my vet says it is a great one.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Pairs well with Wellness Kitten Wet
customer_reviews.text: We feed our kitten this along side Wellness Kitten wet because we know the importance of both wet and dry in a growing kitten's body. Our kitten loves both and we do too since it is grain and by-product free. The price is a little more than your grocery store brand, but well worth it. Our kitten is so energetic, healthy, and happy. When she turns 1, we'll happily switch her to an adult Wellness product. Subscribe to this and save versus stores like Petco.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was very good. Kitten loved it. I now have my cat off of all dry foods due to my other cat dying from kidney failure which can be caused by dry food and dehydration. The vet told me that the worst wet catfood is better than the best dry so since I had 2 cats that died on Wellness, I now buy cheap friskies wet crap. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this. She gobbles it down! She smells better too! I noticed about a week after feeding it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn J.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my kitten's sensitive tummy
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dogs Wellness and after adopting a kitten, assumed it would suit her needs as well. We gave this a try for about a month before switching to Natural Balance. Found that the Wellness food made my kitten very gassy and her BMs very runny. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Better than those ones with by-product
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were colorful like certain cat foods; it looks very boring and unappetizing, but that doesn't matter because my kitten is really likes this food and so do I. It has great ingredients, it's healthy but of course good things are always pricey. I will most likely keep buying this brand. I have a huge bag of the "xxx of the wild" brand I wasted my money on & will probably have to donate/throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Sakura x JuriTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My kitty liked it! After a bit it seemed he wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitty liked it! After a bit it seemed he wanted to eat my old mans cat food instead lol BUT my kitty used to have extremely bad gas and this seemed like it had helped him a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: My cat love this food because it is real chicken flavor
customer_reviews.text: My cat love this food because it is real chicken flavor. I smelled it and it was good. But these are too big to chew for the 5months old kitten. She cannot eat this as dry food but I have to soak these dry food into water for 15~20min to make them soft.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kim

customer_reviews.title: Less Stinky than Core
customer_reviews.text: I was feeding my kittens the CORE kitten food but PHEWEEE did it make their litterbox stinky. One little 5 month old kitten would stink up the whole house worse than a 300 pound man! I switched to this and it doesn't smell nearly as bad out of the bag or in the box! Still healthy for them but just not grain free.
customer_reviews.author: Apriles

customer_reviews.title: Instant hit!
customer_reviews.text: (Kitten, chicken and rice formula) This stuff is like nuggets of kitten yumminess, she loves it, and the top 5 ingredients are all ones that make me happy! I got the small bag on the first try to make sure she liked it, the six pound bag should last about 4 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: LucyB

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Kitten Food!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten immediately adjusted to this new diet change! After reading the reviews I decided this was the quality product for my Rescue Kitten! Good decision!
customer_reviews.author: CJ44

customer_reviews.title: We have a 9 month old kitten and she's been ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a 9 month old kitten and she's been eating this since she's been with us at 8 weeks. She loves it! She has been such a picky eater about wet food and has had stomach issues as we've tried to find the right wet food for her but this has been the one constant dry food that she loves! We leave it out for free feeding.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Approves
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this brand! If put in the room with this and another brand of dry cat food, she will paw at this bag and get excited when we open it. I'll keep buying this probably even after her kitten years if she still likes it. The ingredients are pretty good, so I don't mind buying it consistently.
customer_reviews.author: SynnaBuy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my kitty healthy and fed. Alternate this w wet food, and he has stayed slim and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme

customer_reviews.title: Love this food
customer_reviews.text: Switched from Hill's Science Diet. Doesn't smell as bad and the cats poop isn't as smelly either. If you're going to switch brands/flavor, make sure you switch slowly otherwise your cat won't touch the new food.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: My cat absolutely loves this. He's over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this. He's over a year now, so I don't feed him this anymore. But every once in a while, I'll pull it out as a treat. He goes absolutely crazy as soon as he sees it. He doesn't act that excited for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: She seems happy and healthy and so far no odd 'poo' issues ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves it. She was from the shelter and has only been on it for a week. I will update my review in another month to report any changes to her fur, etc. She seems happy and healthy and so far no odd 'poo' issues due to this food. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MzK

customer_reviews.title: kitten goes crazy for this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I don't like feeding dry but she absolutely loves this stuff. It's the only thing she'll eat consistently. She doesn't get alot but she'll jump on the counter and paw at the bag and cry until I give her some.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire74

customer_reviews.title: Kitten is allergic
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like it, since my kitten loves the wet food. However, it made her really sick. Not sure why, but I could not keep feeding it to her after just the first day. The wet food is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel C

customer_reviews.title: It upset my kitten's stomach and I'm really worried and disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this brand! It upset my kitten's stomach and I'm really worried and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great holistic cat food
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten loves this food - he much prefers it over the always-recommended non-holistic brand at the vet, and is always eager at meal times. I've read that some people didn't like the smell of this food - I don't find that it's offensive at all and not strong smelling. Our indoor kitten's coat is sleek and beautiful with this food and he's gained weight nicely. Much recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Kitten Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Switched kitten from canned to this. Kitten loves it and is very healthy. We keep plenty of fresh cold water throughout the house for the cats to find. Will probably switch to Wellness CORE kitten once this is finished to get the kitten on a grain free diet.
customer_reviews.author: MNG8R

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 kitties love this food and we trust this brand
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 kitties love this food and we trust this brand. We have no reason to switch to anything different.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Carr

customer_reviews.title: cat loves this . recommend
customer_reviews.text: My Bengal cat is 9 months old and picky as can be. She really likes this . I also feed her the wet food which she likes too Third time ordering
customer_reviews.author: Lyla Henseler

customer_reviews.title: I feed my cats dry food only as treats and ...
customer_reviews.text: I feed my cats dry food only as treats and this doesn't upset their tummys. They are on an all wet canned cat food except for these crunchy treats!
customer_reviews.author: Linda N. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love wellness and I really enjoy giving my pets good and healthy meals.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I have fed cats Meow Mix because they love it. However the ingredients are not too good so I thought I would try better quality food for my new kitten. He likes it pretty well, and adding in some tuna helps a lot. He is a healthy cat.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond DeLaurier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this food is good for my cat. It's nice to shop online to get this food. thanks
customer_reviews.author: M.nkotbfan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kittens chow this down! In fact, they prefer it to the canned wellness food.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Tummy really likes this food and his fur is getting softer and a little shinier.
customer_reviews.author: MELO

customer_reviews.title: Great Food!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this kitten food after trying Wellness Core kitten food. My kitten loves this much better than the Core kitten dry food, which had a very strong fishy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Liles

customer_reviews.title: Great nutrition, and our fussy kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our adopted kitty LOVES this food, and his coat looks absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: AdriannicusTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, great deal on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for my first cat when he was a kitten and now my female kitten eats this on the daily. They both love it! I wouldn't buy any other brand nor would I buy from anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: best by date was March 22
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3/29/17, best by date was March 22, 2016. Very disappointed in freshness.
customer_reviews.author: AASCRA

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitten Food
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this food. I got them both from the Animal Shelter, and I look like they've gotten a lot healthier since.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Large Chunks for a "Kitten" Food.
customer_reviews.text: Kitten really didn't care for the big kibble chunks (he was only 5 weeks old at the time), now that he is bigger he's nibbling a bit more - though he whole heartedly prefers Royal Canine.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ann Weber

customer_reviews.title: Wellness kitten food
customer_reviews.text: High quality kitten food is what kittens need to help be healthy adult cats. My adopted kitties Teemu and Selanne are thriving on Wellness.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great kitten food product.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten absolutely loves this food, we have other pets who only eat the wellness brand after trying multiple other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby kitten loves it. I mix handful of this product with Wellness wet food. I assume it's good
customer_reviews.author: GOT IT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love it! And I love the ingredient list. This line was recommended by a pet store employee for my senior girl (now departed) who loved the adult line, so it was a natural transition when I adopted the kittens. They're thriving!
customer_reviews.author: JaneyLou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats go crazy when I shake the bag :) !!
customer_reviews.author: Wh.Country55

customer_reviews.title: ... prefer it to wet food which makes feeding them easy when I am not home
customer_reviews.text: Kittens eat this up and prefer it to wet food which makes feeding them easy when I am not home.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats seems to love it and it seems to be one of the healthiest options on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: Mi kitten likes it and it dies not cause intestinal discomfort as others. I do fed her both wet and dry.
customer_reviews.author: am2014

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: My little kitty never complained. He loved this food too much that he gobbled them all every meal. Now he is a teenage boy eating adult cat food.
customer_reviews.author: qb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kitten seems to like this really well. Will update review if there are any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Check if your bag is expired
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 2.9 lb bag first and our kitten loved it so we purchased the 5.9 lb bag a few weeks later. The 2.9 bag has an expiration day of June 2018, but the larger bag expired the June of 2015! I issued a refund right away and amazon was good about it. However, an expiration date of three years ago is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great food.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my kitten on this food since I adopted him 4 months ago. He loves it and he has a wonderful healthy coat with no heath problems. No vomiting as I've had with other brands for other cats.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGirl Gardener

customer_reviews.title: this was not what I received
customer_reviews.text: this was not what I received. It was the kitten recipe but the bag did not look like the picture here. It was an ok price but I did find a better price elsewhere where I will now order.
customer_reviews.author: Graceabigailheart

customer_reviews.title: It was about $8 cheaper and I didn't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: It was about $8 cheaper and I didn't have to leave the house. More time with my kitten, RC cars, laser pointers, teaching him to play fetch.
customer_reviews.author: Weil Ethelberg Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kitten food
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere on the Internet to find a good brand of cat food that was healthy for my kitten. This is perfect! Before my kitten are mature adult cat food cause my family didn't know what to get so my kitten, Dawn, would still eat it but it was hard for her. Now that I bought this, she loves it! Its a great product for a kitten and it does a great job to promote her health.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Healthy choice
customer_reviews.text: When I brought McGee home, he came with some starter gifts including Wellness dry, kitten food. He can be pretty finicky but he has consistently enjoyed this item.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for dry food
customer_reviews.text: Gives my cats diarrhea, but better than any other dry food out there. It might just be because my cats love it so much that they can't stop eating it. haha
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: High quality cat love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it . And no throwing up. And they seem to need less quantity. Overall very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Raggazza

customer_reviews.title: Well received
customer_reviews.text: This works well as food and treat! One of my kittens likes to take one kibble at a time and play with it before eating it. Other times she will just munch away.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Files

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of this all natural cat food. Unfortunately kitty prefers cheap gmo grain junk food.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Gone in no time at all...
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume that it was delicious! It was barely on the menu before it was gone! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: CissyBlue

customer_reviews.title: The Kittehs Gobble This Up
customer_reviews.text: Well, my cats love it. Good formula, healthy for your cats. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Big Yes
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves this kibble. He does not however like the pate texture of the Wellness kitten food in the can.
customer_reviews.author: Cremant

customer_reviews.title: My cats HATE dry food
customer_reviews.text: My cats HATE dry food, but they gobble this up. The only downside is that wellness food really makes their poop smell vile.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great food! Our kittens are healthy and have glossy coats!
customer_reviews.author: SVRoundabout

customer_reviews.title: I buy Wellness, Dry Kitten and Adult Cat Food ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy Wellness, Dry Kitten and Adult Cat Food, because they don't include GMOs!!! Our kitten loves this food, (and unfortunately our 4-year-old cat does, too), so I was buying a bag often. I learned Amazon sells this food $5 cheaper than my local pet stores. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Shop local
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten loves it! We ordered this because we couldn't find any locally. Now our feed store carries it at half what it cost us to buy it here.
customer_reviews.author: Caring Friend

customer_reviews.title: My foster kittens weren't super big fans of this but probably depends on the ...
customer_reviews.text: My foster kittens weren't super big fans of this but probably depends on the kitten. I also feed my adults grain free nutro and the kittens preferred the nutro to the Wellness even though it was adult food.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: The things I liked the most about Wellness was that it's ingredients were of good quality and it wasn't terribly expensive. It's hard for me to say this stuff is wonderful because I don't eat it myself and never would but my kitten seemed to like it. He gobbled it up and I often mixed it with Wellness's wet kitten food. He grew large pretty fast and the vet said he we healthy every time we went. He's now eating this brand's adult indoor blend and is a healthy, active, 12lbs pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the only cat food i use for my kitten
customer_reviews.author: Devorah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kittens like it and it seems to be a good food.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it.
customer_reviews.text: It gets eaten even when side by side with canned.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: New kitten likes it
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try my new kitten on this; he likes it better than Wellness Kitten Core. Wish it came in bigger bag

customer_reviews.title: cats love it
customer_reviews.text: started feeding my kittens this food when they were six weeks old. They are now 6 months old and they still love it.

customer_reviews.text: my rescued cat is really fond of this, I'm so happy to make a right choice

customer_reviews.text: I love that it is considered healthy and my kitten is a fan.

customer_reviews.text: Cats like this and it seems like good quality. I would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Vet Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food we feed our cats. Vet recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well-- my cats are happy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well-- my cats are happy and healthy. And I know that they are eating good quality food.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this food, I only wish it came in a larger bag!

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Fine, kitten and two adults made quick work of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Curry

customer_reviews.title: My cats got soft and darker poops after having this ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats got soft and darker poops after having this, it's making a huge mess. I have to buy another dry food.
customer_reviews.author: yu fu

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: Best brand ever! I use it for my kitten and my Boston Terrier and they both seem to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Evola

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Kitten loved it! No issues at all, he took to it right away. Would reccomend to anyone looking for a good natural food.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: After bad Purina One kitten food, this was the only thing that saved my poor kitten. 100% recommend to any kitten, worth every penny and they LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitten Hard Food
customer_reviews.text: My kittens have been eating this for over 4 months, and its their favorite hard food. I typically only buy healthy cat foods like wellness, and I've found this price to be reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Sadie loves this
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 month old kitten Sadie just loves this food. She has lots of energy and none of the bloat that other foods gave my other cats. I would recommend this food for anyone with kittens.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN M WYLIE

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrition, but my cats will not eat it
customer_reviews.text: I brought home two bengal kittens (12 weeks old) and after a bunch of research, decided on this dry food by Wellness. It offers high quality meat, excellent ingredients overall, low carbs, etc. The problem is that neither of my kittens will touch the stuff. This seems to be a common problem too, because in the latest "Bengals Illustrated", they gave Wellness a very low rating in terms of desirability to cats (i.e., how much they like it). Too bad. Also, one must consider the recent recall of Wellness food (their canned food actually, but same company). Can we trust them?
customer_reviews.author: MovieGuyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it and I am happy that it doesn't contain any meat by-products.
customer_reviews.author: Miss S Borthakur

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel the stuff is useful for kittens or even old cats. Neighbor dog loved it and stole the bag. Birds that normally go nuts over cat food like this ignored it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: My kitten doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is always hungry and asking for food every time I'm in kitchen. But even if I mixed with her favorite food, she doesn't eat this dry food for somehow. Based on that, I can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ms MT

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Petco
customer_reviews.text: Good brand product and good price :) I used to get this from just offline market. But mich cheaper and free shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Hyesun Lee

customer_reviews.title: Calories are way out of control
customer_reviews.text: After reading several great reviews, I regrettably purchased this for my 6 month old Munchkin Fold kitten. I gave her the recommended serving size and quickly realized she was gaining too much weight. After more thorough research, I found that the recommended serving size for this food has FIVE TIMES the calories she needs!! Don't buy if you love your kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Dayle Doherty

product_meta.title: Wellness Complete Health Natural Dry Cat Food Kitten Chicken Meal & Rice Recipe
product_meta.description: Wellness Complete Health Natural Dry Cat Food, Kitten Health Recipe, is healthy, natural cat food for kittens made with carefully chosen, authentic ingredients for everyday health and provide an optimal balance of nutrient-rich whole foods and vitamins and minerals to fulfill the unique health needs of your growing cat, providing whole-body nutritional support to promote complete health. Wellness Complete Health Dry Cat Food supports your cat's balanced natural nutrition, overall health and vitality, healthy weight goals, optimal nutrient absorption, skin and coat health, digestive health, urinary tract health all with natural and delicious ingredients to provide a guaranteed great taste that cats love.
feature_bullets: Complete Health: Complete And Balanced Everyday Nutrition For Your Cat
Quality Ingredients: Made With Delicious Proteins, Combined With Essential Vitamins And Minerals To Support And Promote Overall Fitness & Vitality
All Natural: Contains Only Premium, All Natural Ingredients With No Wheat, Corn, Soy, Meat By-Products, Artificial Flavors, Colors Or Preservatives
Made In Usa: Backed By The Wellness Guarantee And Proudly Made Only In The Usa
